patthana15.63:1.1_0: Kāmāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanakāmāvacaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.63:1.1_1: Nakāmāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanakāmāvacaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.63:2.1_0: Kāmāvacaraṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanakāmāvacaro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
